about_the_game:
This album features 13 original tracks composed by producer Emi (CX) for Magibrick, equivalent to the content of a full album. It supports both WAV and MP3 320kbps formats.

The Magibrick soundtrack captures the unique essence of various in-game settings. From mountains and seas to Lovecraftian monstrosities, the album uses atmospheric music to paint the game's distinctive world. Producer Emi, known for her sharp Techno tones that depict the clash between a dystopian future and grim reality, explores a more vibrant palette of synthesizers and rich melodies in this collection.

name: 魔幻砖域Magibrick Soundtrack
short_description: This is Soundtrack of Magibrick. Not include game content.
